short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: StreamMania download plugin for Google Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension will let you download from all supported filehosters easily. Just select the links and you can start download right away or copy selected links for download in your favourite download manager (IDM, FDM and similar)
